1_1HvZzixBMnPehyouwx83zNYK3E97MrUVxS.body: fuck you asshole. you don't speak for anyone. take your narrow-minded self and get the fuck out of here. gay, straight, trans, bi, robot, or alien I don't give a shit who somebody loves or masturbates to. they're not harming me and they certainly aren't harming you so go ahead, fuck off and die.
